basics.name: Aditya Tayal
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Skilled software engineer with expertise in AI applications, full-stack development, and cloud architecture. Passionate about building intelligent, user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems.

Reduced manual data entry time by 85%
Led a team of 5 developers to deliver key projects ahead of schedule

work.summary: Full-stack developer focused on data processing applications

Implemented machine learning models for data classification
Reduced system response time by 40% through optimization
